issue.introductory_text: Celebrating Open Science by learning about principles and practices. This is a collection of reproducible papers that showcase how to use many of the Open Science tools.
issue.name: 2014 IEEE Summer School on Biomedical Imaging
issue.short_description: This issue is welcomes all submission from Open Science training activities that took place at the IEEE Summer School on Biomedical Imaging, in Saint Jacut de la Mer, France, June 2014
